question: The third edition of All India Invitational Blind Football Tournament will be held in ___________, Kerala.
explanation: The Indian Blind Football Federation (IBFF) conducted the third edition of All India Invitational Blind Football Tournament in Kochi, Kerala on 27th April to 1st May 2018. Over 100 players from all over India participated in the tournament. The Round Robin League Games were played from 27th April to 29th April 2018 at the Alwaye Blind School Grounds. Blind Football is a fast paced 5-a-side football played by visually impaired athletes with a ball having a noise-making device inside. It is played in a smaller pitch on an enclosed court. The game was introduced as a Paralympic event in 2004.
